title: CP, February 2017, Vol 9, No 2
description: The Pharmaceutical Journal from the Royal Pharmaceutical Society
cleaned_text: The challenges of managing diabetes at mealtimes Mealtimes pose many challenges for people living with diabetes, especially those who require a fast-acting insulin treatment to cover the post-meal glucose surge. Deciding when to eat, what to eat and how much to eat in advance is something that we expect patients to do three times a
